data.title: Current Scholarship Recipients
data.text:
We are so grateful to our generous donors. Philanthropic giving allowed us to award $289,000 to 240 students in 2022-23.

Sherri Mendelson quote Heading link

“I was supported physically, financially and emotionally during my master’s degree at University of Illinois Chicago. Without that support, I probably couldn’t have done it.”

Sherri Mendelson, MS '84, | Donor, Tom and Sherri Mendelson PhD Award

Craig and Sarah Allen Scholarship in Memory of Hal Gold Heading link

Established by honor of Sarah Allen’s (MS ’82) late husband, Hal Gold, this scholarship supports nurse midwifery students.

Bedford Falls Foundation Scholarship Heading link

A $2.1 million gift to the UIC College of Nursing from the Bedford Falls Foundation supports scholarships for BSN students. The private foundation was started by William “Bill” E. Conway, Jr. and his late wife, Joanne.

The first recipients will be named in 2024.

Beverly Bernstein Goldsmith quote Heading link

“I realized that 10 years of my adult life was spent at the UIC College of Nursing. The college and its faculty inspired me and helped me develop into who and what I am.”

Beverly Bernstein Goldsmith, MS '73
